definitions.definition: A process of choosing a leader, members of parliament, councillors or other representatives by popular vote.
definitions.example: How did you vote in (UK also: at) the last election?

definitions.definition: The choice of a leader or representative by popular vote.
definitions.example: The election of John Smith was due to his broad appeal.

definitions.definition: In Calvinism, God's predestination of saints including all of the elect.
